newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.message: Join our mailing list to receive the latest offers and more!
newsletter.consent: I would like to subscribe to updates

productGallery.noImage: New product picture is on the way

cart.title: Cart summary
cart.emptyCart: There's nothing in your cart yet
cart.subtitle: Take a look at what's in your cart before proceeding to checkout.

checkout.noShippingMethodsAvailable: Unfortunately, we are unable to deliver to the specified shipping address. Please adjust your shipping address or contact us.
checkout.noPaymentMethodsAvailable: There are no available payment methods for this order. Please contact shop administrator.
checkout.externalPaymentRedirect: Redirecting to the external Payment Gateway URL...
checkout.useTheSameAddress: Use this address as billing address.
checkout.customerCheckoutMessage: To continue with your order, please fill in your address details or choose one of your saved addresses.
checkout.guestCheckoutMessageP2: to receive updates on new products, faster checkouts, and use order tracking.
checkout.shippingMethodSectionDescription: How should the order be delivered?
checkout.paymentMethodSectionDescription: How would you like to pay?
checkout.placeOrderSectionDescription: Check if everything is correct before you place your order.
checkout.paymentRedirectDescription: You are being redirected to complete payment...
checkout.noPayment: No payment is needed for this order.

checkoutConfirmation.title: Thank you for your order!
checkoutConfirmation.orderReceived: We have received your order (No.: {{referenceNo}}) with the following items:
checkoutConfirmation.realizationNotice: We are working hard on getting your items to you as soon as possible.
checkoutConfirmation.shippingNotice: We will send you a shipping confirmation email once your order is on the way.

errors.monthOutOfRange: Expiry month must be between 01 and 12
errors.yearOutOfRange: Expiry year cannot be in the past
errors.dateOutOfRange: Expiry date cannot be in the past

signIn.title: Sign In
signIn.doNotHaveAnAccountP1: Sign into your account using your credentials. If you don’t have an account you can also

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.successMessage: If there is an account associated with {{values.email}} you will receive an email with a link to reset your password.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.failureMessage: The reset password token you provided is invalid or has expired.
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been reset successfully!

newAccount.title: New Customers
newAccount.benefitsHeader: Creating an account has many benefits:

orderList.title: Orders
orderList.empty: You have not made any purchases yet.

customerSelector.title: Customer
customerSelector.guestPrompt: Type your email and continue as guest:

addressForm.defaultShippingFieldLabel: Use as my default shipping address
addressForm.defaultBillingFieldLabel: Use as my default billing address

notFound.title: Not found
notFound.text: The content you were trying to reach couldn't be found.

formError.uncomplexPassword: Please enter a {{label}} with at least one lower, upper case char and digit
formError.tooShort: Please enter a {{label}} with at least {{min}} characters.
formError.tooLong: Please enter a {{label}} with maximum {{max}} characters.
formError.tooLittleLines: Please enter a {{label}} with at least {{min}} lines.
formError.tooManyLines: Please enter a {{label}} with at most {{max}} lines.
formError.belowRange: Please enter a {{label}} no smaller than {{min}}.
formError.aboveRange: Please enter a {{label}} no greater than {{max}}.
formError.belowDateRange: Please enter a {{label}} no earlier than {{min}}.
formError.aboveDateRange: Please enter a {{label}} no later than {{max}}.
formError.registeredEmailError: This email is registered, please provide a different one or $t(formError.clickHere) to sign in.
formError.differentPasswords: Please ensure that both password fields are the same.

error.failedToFetch: We can not reach our services at this moment, please try again later.

app.offlineMessage: It looks like you are offline. Some services might not work as expected unitl you're back online.
app.confirmLeave: Are you sure you want to leave the page? Information you have entered might not be saved.

checkoutSignIn.title: Sign in to your account.
checkoutSignIn.description: Sign in to proceed to checkout.
checkoutSignIn.newCustomerMessage: Become a member and receive updates on new products, invitations to member-only events, faster checkouts, and order tracking.
checkoutSignIn.guestMessage: Keep in mind you won’t be able to receive exclusive deals, checkout faster and track your orders.

checkoutPending.title: Payment Pending
checkoutPending.body: The status of your payment is being obtained
checkoutPending.pendingOrder: We've received your order but your payment is still pending. Once we've received payment it will be marked as complete and you'll be notified by email.

checkoutFailure.title: Order Failed
checkoutFailure.body: Unfortunately we could not process your payment.
checkoutFailure.restoreCartSuccess: Hooray! We've restored your cart and checkout data.
checkoutFailure.restoreCartFailed: We were unable to restore your data.
checkoutFailure.restoreCartInformation: Would you like us to restore your data to try again?

redirect.default: You will be redirected to finalize your order and pay.
redirect.paypal: You will be redirected to PayPal finalize your order.

klarna.payLater: You will be redirected to Klarna Pay Later to finalize your order.

redirect.giftcard: After adding your giftcard details you will be redirected to finalize your order.

giftcard.note: If you have a pin on your giftcard then we'll need it to make the payment.
